sets.name: Mighty Micros: Captain America vs. Red Skull
sets.description:
Speed into battle against Red Skull with Captain America!

Drive Captain America's Mighty Micros tank towards Red Skull's own cool vehicle. Fend off Red Skull's missiles with Captain America's shield. Who will triumph in this awesome Mighty Micros battle?

  • Includes 2 minifigures with mini legs: Captain America and Red Skull.
  • Captain America's Mighty Micros tank features a front cannon.
  • Red Skull's Mighty Micros vehicle features 2 missiles.
  • Both vehicles have turning wheels.
  • Includes Red Skull's gun.
  • Accessory elements include Captain America's shield and a tesseract.
  • Makes a fun gift for young super heroes.
  • Captain America's Mighty Micros tank measures over 2” (6cm) high, 1” (5cm) long and 1” (4cm) wide.
  • Red Skull's Mighty Micros vehicle measures over 1” (5cm) high, 2” (7cm) long and 1” (4cm) wide.
